Title: Provides an exemption from state sales tax for energy star appliances and grants municipalities the option to provide such exemption
Summary: Provides for exemptions from sales tax for energy-star qualified appliances and grants municipalities the option to provide such exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting energy star appliances from state sales and compensating use taxes and granting municipalities the option to provide such exemption; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
